mapper.select: select * from orders where ui_id=#{ui_id} and or_status = 4 order by or_regdate desc

select distinct o.or_num,o.ui_id,o.or_regdate, f.food_name, fo.fo_name, r.r_img,r.r_name from orders o,food f,food_options fo,restaurant r,orders_detail od, orders_option oo where o.or_num = od.or_num and od.food_num = f.food_num and od.od_num = oo.od_num and f.food_num = fo.food_num and f.r_id=r.r_id and o.or_status = 4 order by o.or_regdate desc
mapper.sql: select * from ( select a.*,rownum rnum1 from( select o.or_regdate,o.or_status, f.food_name,r.r_name,o.or_num,r.r_img,re.re_num,re.re_hit from orders o,food f,orders_detail d,orders_option p,restaurant r,review re where o.or_num=d.or_num and d.od_num=p.od_num(+) and f.r_id=r.r_id and f.food_num=d.food_num and re.or_num(+)=o.or_num and o.or_num=#{or_num} and re.re_num ${re_num} order by o.or_regdate desc )a )b where rnum1=1
mapper.select: select NVL(count(*),0) cnt from (select * from orders o,orders_detail d where o.or_num=d.or_num and o.or_num=#{or_num} and o.or_status='4')
mapper.insert: insert all into review values (review_seq.nextval,#{or_num},#{re_content},#{re_hit},sysdate) into review_photo values (#{rp_photo},review_seq.currval) select * from dual
